thread.title: De'Longhi Coffee Club

author: Jeremy Dixon
title: De'Longhi Coffee Club
text: These days, coffee lovers’ thirst for an espresso, latte macchiato or a flat white is matched by their thirst for knowledge. Understanding more about the different varieties of raw coffee, types of roasting and how to master the perfect cup all help to enhance our enjoyment of the drink. Leading Italian coffee machine manufacturer De'Longhi has a dedicated coffee website for coffee lovers seriousaboutcoffee.com that can help turn your interest into expertise. You will discover every detail about one of the world’s most popular hot drinks from its origins in Africa thousands of years ago to its diverse geography today. Through an interactive map, you can learn what type of coffee is grown where and how geography and climate affects taste and style. You will be introduced to the different types of bean roasting and how that impact on the flavours in your cup. There are useful tips on storing, grinding and brewing coffee, whether your preference is for espresso-based coffees, percolated or drip-filtered. Photo: Getty Join the Coffee Club for free and enjoy the perks It is free to register for The De'Longhi Coffee Club, whether you are already a De'Longhi customer or not. Just go to delonghi.com/en-gb/coffee-club and complete the short online registration form. Every registered member receives access to exclusive content and special offers. But customers who also register their De'Longhi bean-to-cup coffee machine receive a free descaler worth £7.99 RRP. If your bean-to-cup machine has the De'Longhi LatteCrema system (an integrated fresh milk carafe) you can also look forward to a free machine service for 12 months following registration, the value of this free service is £70. Either way, it is well worth taking a minute to enter your details. Coffee Club gives members access to a world of coffee inspiration, including barista and tutorial videos showing you exactly how to get the best from your bean-to-cup coffee machine. There are also recipes for coffee-based party drinks and fabulous Italian dishes, alongside gift ideas, accessory offers and much more. If you are not yet the proud owner of a DeLonghi bean-to-cup machine, being a Coffee Club member gives you direct online access to De'Longhi’s specialised client services team, which can answer any questions or queries you may have. You will also receive a regular newsletter by electronically or by post, keeping you up to date with all the latest Coffee Club news. *Special offer* Machines purchased and registered with the Coffee Club from the 15 October 2015 - 15 January 2016 can claim one months supply of personalised coffee (blended to your choice) sent straight to your home, courtesy of De'Longhi and EightPointNine. Join today at delonghi.com/en-gb/coffee-club T&Cs apply
